data.title: Hookah Reclear Boom Bot + Paint Shells
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to regain control of Hookah and contest Attackers while they are at a disadvantage.

data.title: B Long Reclear From Garden
data.description: Use this Paint Shells lineup to disrupt Attackers that have taken B Long control, it will force them to teleport or give up the space.
